OCBC is the first bank in Singapore to launch its own artificial intelligence unit in 2018 called the Al Lab . fully paid tuition fees along with various allowances, including living and book allowances . kickstart your career and deep dive into Al upon graduation with a one-year rotation with OCBC covering computer vision, natural language processing, traditional machine learning and more .
